Detailed Description

The main class of the whole robot programm.

All objects are created here. This method also starts the GUI.

Constructor & Destructor Documentation

The main class of the whole robot programm.

All objects are created here. This method also starts the GUI.

Member Function Documentation

bool Mrs::simulationMode (  ) 

Returns the status of the program. True, if the simulationMode ist active.

void Mrs::logicalUnit ( int  sensorAlarm  )  [slot]

The locialUnit handles the behavior of the robot.

This slot and called if an obstacle is detected.from the obstacleCheckThread. Turn the robot depending on which sensor made the alarm or stop / start it. The number of alarms are also counted.

void Mrs::showExitDialog (  )  [slot]

Shows the yes-no exit dialog for the main program.

This slot is called when massive errors occur!

void Mrs::enableRemoteControlListening ( bool  status  )  [slot]

Enables or disables the listening for the robot remote control.

This slot is called from an event from the GUI (enable remote button).

void Mrs::executeRemoteCommand ( QString  command  )  [slot]

This slot executes the network remote commands.

void Mrs::setSimulationMode ( bool  status  )  [slot]

This slot enables or disables the simulation mode.
